channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The street light is not turning on, 14th January
item.description:
The light directly outside 126 Salisbury Avenue is not turning on.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 126, Salisbury Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerously damaging pothole in the side of road, 14th January
item.description:
As you drive up birdlip hill, on the increase of the hill just before you read a house build in the side of the road, in quite a shaded woodland area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerously deep pothole on birdlio hill, 14th January
item.description:
The pothole is through the overlooking woodland area just before you reach a house. It is on the left side road as to drive up the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street sign for Inkerman Lane, 14th January
item.description:
Inkerman Lane, Cheltenham. Issue present for several months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Inkerman Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole not fixed as stated. Fixed original pothole and then painted the other one, 14th January
item.description:
You came and filled the original pothole and painted my pothole. You’ve closed my call saying it’s being repaired but it’s not. Why didn’t you just repair both at the same time. Reported pothole is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 14th January
item.description:
jet culvert which goes under road and ditch
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 14th January
